price: ( ߊ߲ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ) ߌ ߛߋ߲߭ ߜߊ߬ߛߌ߬ ( ߘߎ߱ ߟߊ߫ ) ߓߊ߫߸ ߞߏ߬ߟߌ߬ ߦߙߐ߬ ߛߎߡߊߣߍ߲ ߝߟߍ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߌ߲߬ߖߌ
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
translations: (is a spring of) water to bathe
